attributes.action: Raise the minimum wage for 18+ to £5.52
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Once you turn 18 you are classed as an adult yet you still don't receive the "adult" minimum wage. 
Plenty of people go to University when aged 18 but don't receive any form of financial support from the Government even though the Government want more people to go to University and get a Degree. 

Many students have no financial support from family and must survive on a pitiful wage of £4.60 an hour to pay for all the essentials.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
